TopicTitle: Largest flat area on Eve to land my accursed eve ssto.

Articles.Content: No matter how many landing gear, I add, attached to the strongest part, a fuel tank, it breaks. in half and and explodes.  (This was fixed with more struts and Mechjeb landing autopilot set for descent at 1 m/s) But I need flat space to land on land(I can oddly take off on the roughest terrain)
